data.title: Cal Poly Pomona Foundation, Inc.
images: https://www.foundation.cpp.edu/images/My CPPE - Request Intranet access button.png
data.text:
Employment Opportunities

Welcome to the Foundation's employment application process!

You can view our current employment opportunities by clicking on the button below. Once you arrive at the "Job Openings" page, you can view full details of the job opportunity by clicking on the link below the position heading. When you are ready, click on the "Apply" link! You will need to fill out the form that follows by entering all the required information.

It is important that your application shows all the relevant education and experience you possess and be fully completed. Applications may be rejected if incomplete.

Online applications are stored on a secure site. Only authorized employees and hiring authorities have access to the information submitted.

CURRENT JOB OPENINGS

click here to view

If clicking the button above does not work, please try the following link:

https://secure4.saashr.com/ta/6041387.careers?CareersSearch

If you continue experiencing difficulties or have additional questions concerning job opportunities at the Foundation, please contact:

Foundation Human Resource Department

fdnhr@cpp.edu

909-869-2953

909-869-4811
